To achieve that: keep your projects directory clean, name the project in a descriptive way and take care of the internal structure of the project.

item.title: Top popular Zsh plugins on GitHub
item.description: There is an exhaustive but curated list of Zsh plugins posted on GitHub project Awesome Zsh plugins. You can find there 800+ links to plugins, themes and Zsh plugin managers/frameworks. Even though it is a collection of awesome stuff the number is a bit high get orientation which plugins gained already good reputation from Zsh users community. In this post I will identify most popular plugins - those which have the highest number of stars.
